[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fgv/ts-utils](./ts-utils.md) &gt; [ConvertingResultMap](./ts-utils.convertingresultmap.md)

## ConvertingResultMap class

A [ResultMap](./ts-utils.collections.resultmap.md) with a [validator](./ts-utils.collections.resultmapconverter.md) property that enables validated use of the underlying map with weakly-typed keys and values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ConvertingResultMap<TK extends string = string, TV = unknown> extends ResultMap<TK, TV> implements IReadOnlyConvertingResultMap<TK, TV> 
```
**Extends:** [ResultMap](./ts-utils.resultmap.md)<!-- -->&lt;TK, TV&gt;

**Implements:** [IReadOnlyConvertingResultMap](./ts-utils.collections.ireadonlyconvertingresultmap.md)<!-- -->&lt;TK, TV&gt;
